typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Saledata as string,
		salesItem as string,
		country as string,
		Quantity as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SalesTable
SalesTable split(isNull(toDate(Saledata,'dd-MMM-yyyy')),
	disjoint: false) ~> ErrorRecords@(ErrorRecord, GoodRows)
